an7.7:4.1: Atha kho uggo rājamahāmatto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
an7.7:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho uggo rājamahāmatto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
an7.7:5.2: Yāva aḍḍho cāyaṃ, bhante, migāro rohaṇeyyo yāva mahaddhano yāva mahābhogo”ti.
an7.7:5.3: “Kīva aḍḍho panugga, migāro rohaṇeyyo, kīva mahaddhano, kīva mahābhogo”ti?
an7.7:5.4: “Sataṃ, bhante, satasahassānaṃ hiraññassa, ko pana vādo rūpiyassā”ti.
an7.7:5.5: “Atthi kho etaṃ, ugga, dhanaṃ netaṃ ‘natthī’ti vadāmīti.
an7.7:5.6: Tañca kho etaṃ, ugga, dhanaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ agginā udakena rājūhi corehi appiyehi dāyādehi.
an7.7:5.7: Satta kho imāni, ugga, dhanāni asādhāraṇāni agginā udakena rājūhi corehi appiyehi dāyādehi.
an7.7:5.9: Saddhādhanaṃ, sīladhanaṃ, hirīdhanaṃ, ottappadhanaṃ, sutadhanaṃ, cāgadhanaṃ, paññādhanaṃ.
an7.7:5.10: Imāni kho, ugga, satta dhanāni asādhāraṇāni agginā udakena rājūhi corehi appiyehi dāyādehīti.
